mapper.insert: INSERT INTO competition (competitionname, competitiondate, competitionlevel, competitiontype, competitiondescribe) VALUES(#{competitionname}, STR_TO_DATE(#{competitiondate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{competitionlevel}, #{competitiontype}, #{competitiondescribe})
